Summary: very bright, shoots something down, goes off & on like switch, moves slowly
divs: sighting detailsalong with various people, i have seen this object every night over a week. it appears in different places in the sky but is very observable from my home. it is elongated and has two golden amber lights in front? it seemsto be very large and after watching it, the lights seem to go off and on like a light switch. after it goes off, it will come back on after about 30 minutes to an hour. it moves direction very slowly and makes no sound. it ejects objects (lights) downwward. it seems like it is comunincating with three other objects which strobe red, green and blue lights, two of which are mostly stationary and a third which circles over the area of ridgecrest\inyokern, china lake. the strobing lights have been overhad all year though i first noticed them june 2010. i realize that i am right next to naws-the weapons center of the world and edwards, another one and area 51 in the neighborhood but i seriously dont believe this has anything to do with them and i know these thins are not satelites. i am also a prospector and stay out by randsburg in the middle of the desert and have seen these same lights sometimes even closer out there. if there is anyone out there in my area that has seen these i would like to hear their comments. i tried to take a pic of the strobes and the amber light. the strobes don't show up and when i focus in on the amber light my camera shows either a light trail or just a globe of dim light.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Ridgecrest
There were no other sightings in Ridgecrest on or around December 21st 2012
